title: NIAB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Project Research Scientist Post
description: National Institute of Animal Biotechnology (NIAB) has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Research Scientist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post-Graduation, M.Sc., can grab this chance and apply for the NIAB Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online before the la...
